title: Addition Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula:  parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared .
pacedSpeech: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula:    a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=5u^2$$ and $$b=9$$ into the addition binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(5u^2+9\right)}^2={\left(5u^2\right)}^2+2\times5u^2\times9+9^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to, 5 u squared,  and  b is equal to 9  into the addition binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n parentheses, 5 u squared, plus 9  squared is equal to parentheses 5 u squared,  squared plus, 2 times 5 u squared times 9 plus 9 squared
